advisory.name: RLSA-2022:5834
advisory.synopsis: Important: kernel-rt security and bug fix update
advisory.topic:
An update for kernel-rt is now available for Rocky Linux 8.
Rocky Enterprise Software Foundation Product Security has rated this update as having a security impact of Important. A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE link(s) in the References section.
advisory.description:
The kernel-rt packages provide the Real Time Linux Kernel, which enables fine-tuning for systems with extremely high determinism requirements.
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

fixes.description: CVE-2022-1012 kernel: Small table perturb size in the TCP source port generation algorithm can lead to information leak
CVE-2022-32250 kernel: a use-after-free write in the netfilter subsystem can lead to privilege escalation to root
